fixes.name: Initial Cash USD T -1
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR useCustom = SELECTEDVALUE('Use Custom Date'[Display As])
RETURN
IF(
    useCustom,
    IF(
        'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[MAX_DATE -1day] = 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[RpDate],
        'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Ut. US MM],
        0
    ),
    IF(
        'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[End DATE - 1day] = 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[RpDate],
        'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Ut. US MM],
        0
    )
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Replaced the parameter reference with SELECTEDVALUE('Use Custom Date'[Display As]); transformed all field references to 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Column] format; preserved the nested IF logic: when the parameter is true use MAX_DATE -1day comparison, otherwise use End DATE - 1day comparison, returning Ut. US MM or 0 accordingly.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The calculation references a parameter, and all parameter-based calculations must be measures.
